items.name: BasicLaser
items.description: A basic laser-based weapon. Charged shot has to lock on before homing.

items.name: GatlingLaser

items.name: IonCannon
items.description: A slow-charging, overclocked EMF generator that shoots homing orbs of electrostatic destruction.

items.name: MissileLauncher
items.description: Onboard Missile Replicator lets you shoot a constant stream of fire-and-forget, armor-penetrating missiles!
